body.name: Linen Curtains 84 Inches Long Embroidery Striped Farmhouse Curtains for Living Room Tassel Boho Curtains for Bedroom Light Filtering Curtains 2 Panels Set Rod Pocket Drapes (52" W x 84" L,Khaki)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 37 mins
features: ✿Ready Made Window Curtains : Package includes 2 Boho Window Curtain panels, each measuring 52"W & 84"L . Rod Pocket design, easy to install and slide. Refresh your space with the soft look and peaceful feel of our curtains

✿Bohemian Design: Our bohemian curtains are made of natural cotton linen blend fabric which is soft handfeel and looks rustic and chic ,featuring with exquisite embroidery stripe and bohemian tassel, beautifully frames your windows with a soft and hazy vision

✿Light Filtering and Privacy: Semi-Blackout curtains filter out harsh sunlight and let the natural diffused light and breeze flow through your windows but not see through. Appears a light, airy and privacy look for your home living room, bedroom, nursery room, laundry room, doorway

✿Enhance Your Home: Our window curtains are available in various style and color, you can easily blend these with your existing home décor. The soft color and fabric would work with many different styles, great idea for room farmhouse and boho decor
✿Easy Care: These chic farmhouse bedroom curtains can be machine washable in cold water, gentle cycle, tumble dry. Iron at low settings if needed needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good curtains!
reviews.reviewText: These are super cute curtains. They give a nice pink hue to your room when the sun is out, and I loved this since pink is my favorite color and it was always just super nice and soft lighting to wake up to. They perfectly fit the size of my big window which is great because it’s hard to get a size this big. They are thick and heavy but lighting was still able to get through… just not too much which was great! I placed a white accent curtain on top to give it more style but still cute without it.Very cute curtain… a good buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I chose the Khaki to go with my greige walls and they bring out the warmth in the greige. I like that they let a little light in but allow some privacy.They are very pretty and seem heavy and well made. I was glad to see they didn’t have creases so I was immediately able to hang them. I used hooks and clips to hang from the rod and it worked fine. They bring a nice texture to the room! I really like them! I overlooked that they come in a two pack so I accidentally bought an extra package…so just a note to other buyers. It is a 2 pack!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I cannot say enough good things about these curtains. I am currently remodeling a spare bedroom and doing it Boho style - of course. My expectations for these curtains was extremely low but let me tell you!! These so amazing. The color is perfection and what I expected, the style is ever more beautiful in person, the detail is definitely better then anticipated. The quality is sturdy, but not heavy. The quality, color, cost and style far exceeded my expectations and I want to buy more for the rest of my house. These let just the right amount of light into the room without creating a dark space. STUNNING! If you have these in your cart - presss BUY NOW - you won't regret it.Hope this honest review was helpful :) CR

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not blackout, but they are gorgeous
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are super heavy! They feel like a linen/poly blend (definitely not full linen,) and they wash and dry like a dream. There were no wrinkles, even after leaving them crumpled in a pile for 8 hours while at work. Wrinkle-free is a must.The embroidery is larger than expected, and the rod pocket is super wide so any rod size would fit.The fabric blocks out most of the sunlight, which is perfect for us. So these are definitely slightly sheer, and they are not blackout as stated (which is easy to tell from the photos anyways.)Size is as stated. Im very impressed.Pros:-high quality-wrinkle-free-wide rod pocket-fabric blend feels luxuriousCons:-would love to see more color selections-Does not have matching ties (I know it didn't say it would, but some tassel tie-backs would have made these even better.)In short, buy these. Seriously. We have gauze curtains in the rest of the room and these match so well with everything.If you could also sell some matching throw pillows, I'd love that.5 stars!*photos were taken on a very sunny afternoon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic quality and beautiful design
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the boho curtains for my room, and I couldn't be more delighted with my choice. Firstly, the beautiful color of the curtains is exactly what I was looking for to add a touch of vibrancy to my room. The attention to detail in the stitching is remarkable – the seams are perfectly done, reflecting a high level of craftsmanship and quality. What I appreciate most about these curtains is their perfect balance in thickness. They are not too thick to create a blackout effect, allowing just the right amount of natural light to filter through. At the same time, they're not overly thin, providing ample privacy and a lovely drape. The overall quality of these curtains is outstanding, and they have truly transformed the ambiance of my room. I would rate these curtains a solid 10/10 for their beautiful aesthetic, impeccable stitching, and versatile thickness. I love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bohemian Bliss: BCLBUSTE’s Embroidered Curtains Illuminate My Bedroom
reviews.reviewText: Upon searching for the perfect curtains to add a touch of bohemian charm to my bedroom, I stumbled upon the BCLBUSTE Boho Curtains, and I couldn’t be more thrilled with my discovery. The intricate embroidery immediately caught my eye, exuding a unique blend of craftsmanship and artistry that’s hard to come by.The curtains drape beautifully, casting a soft, ethereal glow in the room when sunlight filters through the delicate patterns. Not only do they provide the privacy I desire, but they also serve as a mesmerizing focal point, instantly elevating the room’s aesthetic.The quality of the fabric is commendable, feeling both luxurious to the touch and durable in construction. It’s evident that every stitch was crafted with care and precision, resulting in curtains that are both functional and a work of art.Every morning, as I draw these curtains open, I’m reminded of the beauty they bring to my space. The BCLBUSTE Boho Curtains are more than just window dressings; they’re a testament to the magic that happens when design meets functionality. For anyone looking to infuse a hint of bohemian flair into their sanctuary, these curtains are a dream come true.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful boho light filtering curtains
reviews.reviewText: These are lightweight and filters the light, but certainly doesn’t provide much privacy. They were just what we were hoping for in our bedroom redo! 4 stars because I was hoping they’d be a bit thicker based on description and other reviews.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pleasantly surprised! These curtains exceeded my expectations!! They are beautiful quality. Just the right amount of sheer, linen feel, the fabric looks natural and has a good weight to it. The tassel and embroidery design give them an “Anthro”/boho meets cottagecore, vintage farmhouse vibe, in a good way! I got the khaki embroidered ones and they’re a light tan. Couldn’t find anything like this anywhere, especially for this low price!
